rules.sql: SELECT COUNT(${default_file_name}) FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES WHERE TABLE_TYPE =  BASE TABLE

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT TABLE_NAME) FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES WHERE TABLE_SCHEMA = CURRENT_SCHEMA() AND TABLE_TYPE =  BASE TABLE  AND TABLE_NAME NOT IN (SELECT TABLE_NAME FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLE_CONSTRAINTS WHERE CONSTRAINT_TYPE =  PRIMARY KEY )
rules.description: Check for tables without primary keys

rules.sql: SELECT ROUND(SUM(BYTES)/1024/1024, 2) FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLE_STORAGE_METRICS WHERE ACTIVE_BYTES > 0
SELECT COUNT(${default_file_name}) FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES WHERE TABLE_TYPE =  BASE TABLE  AND LAST_ALTERED > DATEADD(DAY, -7, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP())
SELECT COUNT(${default_file_name}) FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES WHERE TABLE_TYPE =  BASE TABLE  AND ROW_COUNT = 0
rules.description: Validate no tables with zero rows

rules.sql: SELECT COUNT(${default_file_name}) FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLE_STORAGE_METRICS WHERE TABLE_DROPPED IS NULL AND ACTIVE_BYTES > 0 AND TABLE_LAST_ALTERED < DATEADD(DAY, -30, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP())
rules.description: Check for stale tables (not accessed in 30 days)

rules.sql: SELECT SUM(ROW_COUNT) FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES WHERE TABLE_TYPE =  BASE TABLE
rules.description: Monitor total row count across all tables

rules.sql: SELECT COUNT(${default_file_name}) FROM (SELECT COLUMN_NAME FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_SCHEMA = CURRENT_SCHEMA() GROUP BY COLUMN_NAME HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT TABLE_NAME) > 5)
rules.description: Check for duplicate column names across tables

rules.sql: SELECT COUNT(${default_file_name}) FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.VIEWS WHERE TABLE_SCHEMA = CURRENT_SCHEMA()

SELECT COUNT(${default_file_name}) FROM (SELECT TABLE_NAME, COUNT(${default_file_name}) AS COL_COUNT FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_SCHEMA = CURRENT_SCHEMA() GROUP BY TABLE_NAME HAVING COUNT(${default_file_name}) > 50)
rules.description: Check for tables with too many columns

rules.sql: SELECT COUNT(${default_file_name}) FROM TABLE(INFORMATION_SCHEMA.QUERY_HISTORY(DATE_RANGE_START=>DATEADD( hour ,-24,CURRENT_TIMESTAMP()))) WHERE ERROR_CODE IS NOT NULL
rules.description: Monitor query history for failed queries

rules.sql: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT WAREHOUSE_NAME) FROM TABLE(INFORMATION_SCHEMA.WAREHOUSE_METERING_HISTORY(DATE_RANGE_START=>DATEADD( day ,-1,CURRENT_TIMESTAMP())))
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT USER_NAME) FROM TABLE(INFORMATION_SCHEMA.LOGIN_HISTORY(DATE_RANGE_START=>DATEADD( hour ,-24,CURRENT_TIMESTAMP()))) WHERE IS_SUCCESS =  YES
SELECT COUNT(${default_file_name}) FROM TABLE(INFORMATION_SCHEMA.QUERY_HISTORY(DATE_RANGE_START=>DATEADD( hour ,-24,CURRENT_TIMESTAMP()))) WHERE TOTAL_ELAPSED_TIME > 300000
SELECT SUM(BYTES_SCANNED) FROM TABLE(INFORMATION_SCHEMA.QUERY_HISTORY(DATE_RANGE_START=>DATEADD( hour ,-1,CURRENT_TIMESTAMP())))
SELECT COUNT(${default_file_name}) FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.PROCEDURES WHERE LAST_ALTERED < DATEADD(MONTH, -6, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP())
SELECT COUNT(${default_file_name}) FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLE_CONSTRAINTS WHERE CONSTRAINT_TYPE =  FOREIGN KEY
SELECT COUNT(${default_file_name}) FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES WHERE DATA_RETENTION_TIME_IN_DAYS > 0
SELECT COUNT(${default_file_name}) FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES WHERE TABLE_TYPE =  BASE TABLE  AND CLUSTERING_KEY IS NOT NULL
SELECT COUNT(${default_file_name}) FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.STAGES WHERE COMMENT IS NOT NULL
